channel.title: Need A Server Hoster ( 24/7 ) and He Must Have
channel.description:
Yea....
I need a server hoster because i can't. You must be exsperenced and have a server restarter for every 30 mins. REMEMBER i want it to be a no-ip and i have the name. I will also put the server source on megaupload for ya.
Base: Fr33sc4p3 :D THanks fr33 ya server ownes
You will get co-owner also..
Post here if you will like todo this for me!
Apprecate it.
-[b]LiAm

item.title: Need A Server Hoster ( 24/7 ) and He Must Have
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

if so, heres how i do it. not sure if theres a simpler way… never really cared to check…

right click on the folder and click “add to archive”

hit browse and choose to compress it to desktop…

choose the name

select RAR

hit ok

your done

Read full topic
